6// RecordUniformBlocksTranslatedToStructuredBuffers.cpp:
7// Collect all uniform blocks which will been translated to StructuredBuffers on Direct3D
8// backend.
9//
10
11#include "compiler/translator/tree_ops/RecordUniformBlocksTranslatedToStructuredBuffers.h"
12
13#include "compiler/translator/Compiler.h"
14#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/IntermNode_util.h"
15#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/IntermTraverse.h"
16
17namespace sh
18{
19
20namespace
21{
22// Only when a uniform block member's array size is greater than or equal to
23// kMinArraySizeUseStructuredBuffer, then we may translate the uniform block
24// to a StructuredBuffer on Direct3D backend.
25const unsigned int kMinArraySizeUseStructuredBuffer = 50u;
26
27// There is a maximum of D3D11_COMMONSHADER_INPUT_RESOURCE_SLOT_COUNT(128) slots that are available
28// for shader resources on Direct3D 11. When shader version is 300, we only use
29// D3D11_COMMONSHADER_SAMPLER_SLOT_COUNT(16) slots for texture units. We allow StructuredBuffer to
30// use the maximum of 60 slots, that is enough here.
31const unsigned int kMaxAllowToUseRegisterCount = 60u;
32
33// Traverser that collects all uniform blocks which will been translated to StructuredBuffer on
34// Direct3D backend.
35class UniformBlockTranslatedToStructuredBufferTraverser : public TIntermTraverser
36{
37 public:
38 UniformBlockTranslatedToStructuredBufferTraverser();
39
40 void visitSymbol(TIntermSymbol *node) override;
41 bool visitBinary(Visit visit, TIntermBinary *node) override;
42 std::map<int, const TInterfaceBlock *> &getUniformBlockMayTranslation()
43 {
44 return mUniformBlockMayTranslation;
45 }
46 std::map<int, const TInterfaceBlock *> &getUniformBlockNotAllowTranslation()
47 {
48 return mUniformBlockNotAllowTranslation;
49 }
50 std::map<int, unsigned int> &getUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount()
51 {
52 return mUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount;
53 }
54
55 private:
56 void parseAccessWholeUniformBlock(TIntermTyped *node);
57 std::map<int, const TInterfaceBlock *> mUniformBlockMayTranslation;
58 std::map<int, const TInterfaceBlock *> mUniformBlockNotAllowTranslation;
59 std::map<int, unsigned int> mUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount;
60};
61
62UniformBlockTranslatedToStructuredBufferTraverser::
63 UniformBlockTranslatedToStructuredBufferTraverser()
64 : TIntermTraverser(true, false, false)
65{}
66
67static bool IsSupportedTypeForStructuredBuffer(const TType &type)
68{
69 const TStructure *structure = type.getStruct();
70 if (structure)
71 {
72 const TFieldList &fields = structure->fields();
73 for (size_t i = 0; i < fields.size(); i++)
74 {
75 // Do not allow the structure's member is array or structure.
76 if (fields[i]->type()->isArray() || fields[i]->type()->getStruct() ||
77 !IsSupportedTypeForStructuredBuffer(*fields[i]->type()))
78 {
79 return false;
80 }
81 }
82 return true;
83 }
84 else if (type.isMatrix())
85 {
86 // Only supports the matrix types that we do not need to pad in a structure or an array
87 // explicitly.
88 return (type.getLayoutQualifier().matrixPacking != EmpRowMajor && type.getRows() == 4) ||
89 (type.getLayoutQualifier().matrixPacking == EmpRowMajor && type.getCols() == 4);
90 }
91 else
92 {
93 // Supports vector and scalar types in a structure or an array.
94 return true;
95 }
96}
97
98static bool CanTranslateUniformBlockToStructuredBuffer(const TInterfaceBlock &interfaceBlock)
99{
100 const TLayoutBlockStorage blockStorage = interfaceBlock.blockStorage();
101
102 if (blockStorage == EbsStd140 && interfaceBlock.fields().size() == 1u)
103 {
104 const TType &fieldType = *interfaceBlock.fields()[0]->type();
105 if (fieldType.getNumArraySizes() == 1u &&
106 fieldType.getOutermostArraySize() >= kMinArraySizeUseStructuredBuffer)
107 {
108 return IsSupportedTypeForStructuredBuffer(fieldType);
109 }
110 }
111
112 return false;
113}
114
115void UniformBlockTranslatedToStructuredBufferTraverser::visitSymbol(TIntermSymbol *node)
116{
117 const TVariable &variable = node->variable();
118 const TType &variableType = variable.getType();
119 TQualifier qualifier = variable.getType().getQualifier();
120
121 if (qualifier == EvqUniform)
122 {
123 const TInterfaceBlock *interfaceBlock = variableType.getInterfaceBlock();
124 if (interfaceBlock && CanTranslateUniformBlockToStructuredBuffer(*interfaceBlock))
125 {
126 if (mUniformBlockMayTranslation.count(interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()) == 0)
127 {
128 mUniformBlockMayTranslation[interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()] = interfaceBlock;
129 }
130
131 if (!variableType.isInterfaceBlock())
132 {
133 TIntermNode *accessor = getAncestorNode(0);
134 TIntermBinary *accessorAsBinary = accessor->getAsBinaryNode();
135 // The uniform block variable is array type, only indexing operator is allowed to
136 // operate on the variable, otherwise do not translate the uniform block to HLSL
137 // StructuredBuffer.
138 if (!accessorAsBinary ||
139 !(accessorAsBinary && (accessorAsBinary->getOp() == EOpIndexDirect ||
140 accessorAsBinary->getOp() == EOpIndexIndirect)))
141 {
142 if (mUniformBlockNotAllowTranslation.count(interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()) ==
143 0)
144 {
145 mUniformBlockNotAllowTranslation[interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()] =
146 interfaceBlock;
147 }
148 }
149 else
150 {
151 if (mUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount.count(interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()) == 0)
152 {
153 // The uniform block is not an instanced one, so it only uses one register.
154 mUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount[interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()] = 1;
155 }
156 }
157 }
158 else
159 {
160 if (mUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount.count(interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()) == 0)
161 {
162 // The uniform block is an instanced one, the count of used registers depends on
163 // the array size of variable.
164 mUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount[interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()] =
165 variableType.isArray() ? variableType.getOutermostArraySize() : 1;
166 }
167 }
168 }
169 }
170}
171
172bool UniformBlockTranslatedToStructuredBufferTraverser::visitBinary(Visit visit,
173 TIntermBinary *node)
174{
175 switch (node->getOp())
176 {
177 case EOpIndexDirect:
178 {
179 if (visit == PreVisit)
180 {
181 const TType &leftType = node->getLeft()->getType();
182 if (leftType.isInterfaceBlock())
183 {
184 const TInterfaceBlock *interfaceBlock = leftType.getInterfaceBlock();
185 if (CanTranslateUniformBlockToStructuredBuffer(*interfaceBlock) &&
186 mUniformBlockMayTranslation.count(interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()) == 0)
187 {
188 mUniformBlockMayTranslation[interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()] =
189 interfaceBlock;
190 if (mUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount.count(
191 interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()) == 0)
192 {
193 // The uniform block is an instanced one, the count of used registers
194 // depends on the array size of variable.
195 mUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount[interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()] =
196 leftType.isArray() ? leftType.getOutermostArraySize() : 1;
197 }
198 return false;
199 }
200 }
201 }
202 break;
203 }
204 case EOpIndexDirectInterfaceBlock:
205 {
206 if (visit == InVisit)
207 {
208 const TInterfaceBlock *interfaceBlock =
209 node->getLeft()->getType().getInterfaceBlock();
210 if (CanTranslateUniformBlockToStructuredBuffer(*interfaceBlock))
211 {
212 TIntermNode *accessor = getAncestorNode(0);
213 TIntermBinary *accessorAsBinary = accessor->getAsBinaryNode();
214 // The uniform block variable is array type, only indexing operator is allowed
215 // to operate on the
216 // variable, otherwise do not translate the uniform block to HLSL
217 // StructuredBuffer.
218 if ((!accessorAsBinary ||
219 !(accessorAsBinary && (accessorAsBinary->getOp() == EOpIndexDirect ||
220 accessorAsBinary->getOp() == EOpIndexIndirect))) &&
221 mUniformBlockNotAllowTranslation.count(interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()) ==
222 0)
223 {
224 mUniformBlockNotAllowTranslation[interfaceBlock->uniqueId().get()] =
225 interfaceBlock;
226 return false;
227 }
228 }
229 }
230 break;
231 }
232 default:
233 break;
234 }
235
236 return true;
237}
238} // namespace
239
240bool RecordUniformBlocksTranslatedToStructuredBuffers(
241 TIntermNode *root,
242 std::map<int, const TInterfaceBlock *> &uniformBlockTranslatedToStructuredBuffer)
243{
244 UniformBlockTranslatedToStructuredBufferTraverser traverser;
245 root->traverse(&traverser);
246 std::map<int, const TInterfaceBlock *> &uniformBlockMayTranslation =
247 traverser.getUniformBlockMayTranslation();
248 std::map<int, const TInterfaceBlock *> &uniformBlockNotAllowTranslation =
249 traverser.getUniformBlockNotAllowTranslation();
250 std::map<int, unsigned int> &uniformBlockUsedRegisterCount =
251 traverser.getUniformBlockUsedRegisterCount();
252
253 unsigned int usedRegisterCount = 0;
254 for (auto &uniformBlock : uniformBlockMayTranslation)
255 {
256 if (uniformBlockNotAllowTranslation.count(uniformBlock.first) == 0)
257 {
258 usedRegisterCount += uniformBlockUsedRegisterCount[uniformBlock.first];
259 if (usedRegisterCount > kMaxAllowToUseRegisterCount)
260 {
261 break;
262 }
263 uniformBlockTranslatedToStructuredBuffer[uniformBlock.first] = uniformBlock.second;
264 }
265 }
266 return true;
267}
268
269} // namespace sh
